channel.title: [317]Runescape Remake[2005-2006 era]
channel.description:
This is going to be what I will be working on for the next couple weeks, before I go any further it will not have customs, and will not be a 317 loading w/e, it will have quests, It will be my own base (wish me luck!)
Not going to add torva etc. Will be adding music/sounds etc.
Colors - Green = Complete Orange = Started Red = Not Started
I will be using snippets, on how to do some of these stuff.
As I am going to be starting from scratch, will I be working alone? Yes, as always.
So far -
Logging in walking running Combat system Player vs. Player Player vs. Npc Other Skills Started music/sounds minigames quests items weildable Correct stats More to Come

item.title: [317]Runescape Remake[2005-2006 era]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“austin cadle, post:45, topic:411658”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=512910.msg3726766#msg3726766 date=1314318341]

Anyone got a base they want me to use?
Preferably not pi

hyperion or shards?

I wanted to use Hyperion but there is no client link =/

srcAllDummysRemoved works. And there is a webclient in the hyperion download.

nah nvm, i give up im working on 614 now

Boo… – for that, bad move.

Edit: damn, I already ++ you at the beginning of the topic.
[/quote]
Jk, all I need IS a Hyperion client,[/quote]

If you can’t find a hyperion client then try using shards?

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Runescape Remake[2005-2006 era]
item.dc:creator: @austin_cadle austin cadle
item.description:
@austin_cadle wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:33, topic:411658”]My view is this: it may be “another RS remake” to the viewers… but to the person who wants the nostalgic vibe they get from developing an RS remake, it’s not “another”. Everyone has the right to make a remake if they wish, and they are great to see.

Take your time, don’t rush. You’re making your own framework so you don’t want something that’s sloppy and slow just because you couldn’t wait to get to the content. Trust, it will pay off.[/quote]

I hope i can make my own base, and if I cannot make my own base I will use a blank base, so I can make everything myself

I’ll be on google a lot looking up tuts on how to add quests etc.
And noons seems to be able to make it when u beat a quest u actually get points I will try to change this

Read full topic

item.title: [317]Runescape Remake[2005-2006 era]
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

My view is this: it may be “another RS remake” to the viewers… but to the person who wants the nostalgic vibe they get from developing an RS remake, it’s not “another”. Everyone has the right to make a remake if they wish, and they are great to see.

Take your time, don’t rush. You’re making your own framework so you don’t want something that’s sloppy and slow just because you couldn’t wait to get to the content. Trust, it will pay off.

Read full topic
